terms.description: Hoehn and Yarh stage; a clinical rating scale to describe severity and progression of motor symptoms in Parkinson's Disease

terms.name: Side of onset
terms.description: Refers to the body side (left or right) where motor symptoms of Parkinson’s disease first appeared; typically categorized as left, right, or bilateral/unknown if onset was not clearly lateralized

terms.name: Levodopa Equivalent Daily Dose
terms.description: Levodopa Equivalent Daily Dose; a calculated value that expresses the total daily dose of all dopaminergic medications in terms of their equivalent potency to levodopa, reported in milligrams (mg)
